# bm-radio



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Usage

### Html

```html
<form>
  <bm-field label="Radio">
    <bm-radio name="storybook" checked="true"> Yes </bm-radio>
    <bm-radio name="storybook" checked="false"> No </bm-radio>
  </bm-field>
</form>
```



## Properties

| Property     | Attribute     | Description   | Type      | Default     |
| ------------ | ------------- | ------------- | --------- | ----------- |
| `checked`    | `checked`     | Checked       | `boolean` | `false`     |
| `disabled`   | `disabled`    | Disabled      | `boolean` | `false`     |
| `inputClass` | `input-class` | Input class   | `string`  | `''`        |
| `labelClass` | `label-class` | Label Classes | `string`  | `''`        |
| `name`       | `name`        | Name          | `string`  | `undefined` |
